snippet: Chesapeake Energy, in an effort to quell an open revolt by shareholders angry about high executive compensation and poor corporate oversight, said it would replace four current board members with new outside directors.
abstract: Chesapeake Energy, in an effort to quell an open revolt by shareholders angry about high executive compensation and poor corporate oversight, says it will replace four current board members with new outside directors.
lead_paragraph: Chesapeake Energy, in an effort to quell an open revolt by shareholders angry about high executive compensation and poor corporate oversight, said it would replace four current board members with new outside directors.

headline.seo: Chesapeake Energy Agrees to New Board
headline.main: Chesapeake Agrees to Revamp Its Board
headline.print_headline: Chesapeake Agrees To Revamp Its Board
